name: 琳达·薇拉斯
introduction: 意大利美人Linda Veras (born Sieglinda Veras in 1939) is a former Italian actress and glamour model. She is best known for her appearances in Spaghetti Westerns, namely Sergio Sollima's Face to Face and Run, Man, Run, and Gianfranco Parolini's Sabata.1971		Romance of a Horsethief饰演 Countess Grabowsky1970		Chapaqua's Gold饰演 Moira Shannon / Nelson1969		一代枪王饰演 Jane1968		神龙闪电枪续集饰演 Penny Bannington1968		足球流氓饰演 Sophie1968		God Made Them...
